name: Nightmane Stallion

physical_description.appearance: A magnificent black stallion whose mane and tail flow like liquid shadow. Hooves spark with ethereal blue light, and its eyes reflect the phases of the moon.
distinguishing_features: Mane that flows like living shadow
Hooves that leave traces of moonlight

abilities.name: Moonlight Gallop
abilities.description: Can run across any surface, including air and water, under moonlight

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Can briefly phase through obstacles while galloping

abilities.name: Tireless Endurance
abilities.description: Never tires while the moon is visible in the sky

mount_capabilities.bonding_requirements: Must be approached only during the new moon, offering a token of pure silver, and demonstrate respect for the night

habitat.territorial_behavior: Roams freely across vast territories, following lunar cycles

lore_significance: Nightmane Stallions exemplify the mystical burden-sharing ability of mounts. When bonded with a rider, they create a mystical connection that allows them to carry not just the physical weight of their master's possessions, but also the spiritual burden of their adventures. This mystical load-sharing explains how mounted adventurers can carry extensive inventories while maintaining incredible speed and endurance.
